attributes.action: Create street lighting in Woodhouse Moor (Leeds) to increase safety
attributes.background: Hyde Park is the most popular student area in Leeds where a large majority of university students live. Commuting to Hyde Park from many areas involves walking through Woodhouse Moor. It is totally unlit so therefore feels unsafe to walk through in the dark, a problem which could easily be solved.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Street lighting is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: 

http://democracy.leeds.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
